title: search '*a*' never completes
body:
#### What is the problem?
Seems to relate to have metadata explicitly aggregated, gets stuck with the last message being `[INFO   ] Search index contains 134 documents` at any debug level:
```shell
hopa:/tmp
$> datalad install ///openfmri/ds000001
[INFO   ] Cloning http://datasets.datalad.org/openfmri/ds000001 to '/tmp/ds000001' 
[INFO   ] access to dataset sibling "datalad" not auto-enabled, enable with:
| 		datalad siblings -d "/tmp/ds000001" enable -s datalad 
install(ok): /tmp/ds000001 (dataset)
(dev) 2 14554 [1].....................................:Thu 21 Dec 2017 10:47:47 AM EST:.
hopa:/tmp
$> cd ds000001            
CHANGES                   sub-01/  sub-05/  sub-09/  sub-13/  task-balloonanalogrisktask_bold.json
README                    sub-02/  sub-06/  sub-10/  sub-14/
dataset_description.json  sub-03/  sub-07/  sub-11/  sub-15/
participants.tsv          sub-04/  sub-08/  sub-12/  sub-16/
(dev) 2 14555 [1].....................................:Thu 21 Dec 2017 10:47:52 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds000001[master]
$> datalad search '*a*' 
[INFO   ] Building search index 
[INFO   ] Scanning for metadata keys 
[INFO   ] Added 134 documents on dataset . 
[INFO   ] Search index contains 134 documents 
[INFO   ] Query completed in 0.0362000465393 sec. Reporting up to 20 top matches. 
search(ok): .
search(ok): sub-09/func/sub-09_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-01_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-08/func/sub-08_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-02_events.tsv
search(ok): sub-07/func/sub-07_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-03_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-16/func/sub-16_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-01_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-16/func/sub-16_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-03_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-12/func/sub-12_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-02_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-11/anat/sub-11_T1w.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-10/func/sub-10_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-03_events.tsv
search(ok): sub-15/func/sub-15_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-01_events.tsv
search(ok): sub-02/func/sub-02_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-02_events.tsv
search(ok): sub-15/func/sub-15_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-02_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-05/func/sub-05_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-01_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-09/func/sub-09_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-03_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-05/func/sub-05_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-02_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-06/func/sub-06_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-03_bold.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-03/func/sub-03_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-01_events.tsv
search(ok): sub-10/func/sub-10_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-02_events.tsv
search(ok): sub-12/anat/sub-12_T1w.nii.gz
search(ok): sub-08/func/sub-08_task-balloonanalogrisktask_run-01_bold.nii.gz
[INFO   ] Reached the limit of 20 top matches, there could be more which were not reported. 
action summary:
  search (ok: 20)
(dev) 2 14556 [1].....................................:Thu 21 Dec 2017 10:48:00 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds000001[master]
$> datalad aggregate-metadata -r
[INFO   ] Aggregate metadata for dataset /tmp/ds000001 
[INFO   ] Update aggregate metadata in dataset at: /tmp/ds000001 
aggregate_metadata(ok): /tmp/ds000001 (dataset)                                                                 
[INFO   ] Attempting to save 6 files/datasets 
save(ok): /tmp/ds000001 (dataset)
action summary:
  aggregate_metadata (ok: 1)
  save (ok: 1)
(dev) 2 14557 [1].....................................:Thu 21 Dec 2017 10:48:06 AM EST:.
(git-annex)hopa:/tmp/ds000001[master]
$> datalad search '*a*'         
[INFO   ] Rebuilding search index 
[INFO   ] Scanning for metadata keys 
[INFO   ] Added 134 documents on dataset . 
[INFO   ] Search index contains 134 documents 

```
datalad as of #2050 0.9.1-527-g55b45529

I think AutomagicIO is not involved in this one:
```shell
$> datalad -l 2 search '*a*'
[DEBUG  ] Determined class of decorated function: <class 'datalad.metadata.search.Search'> 
[Level 5] Parsed ri /tmp/ds000001 into fields {'username': '', 'scheme': '', 'fragment': '', 'hostname': '', 'query': '', 'path': '/tmp/ds000001', 'password': '', 'port': ''}

[Level 5] Detected url ri

[Level 5] Detected file ri 
[Level 9] Running: ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'log', '-n', '1', '--pretty=format:%H', '--', '.datalad/metadata/aggregate_v1.json'] 
[Level 8] Finished running ['git', '-c', 'receive.autogc=0', '-c', 'gc.auto=0', 'log', '-n', '1', '--pretty=format:%H', '--', '.datalad/metadata/aggregate_v1.json'] with status 0
```

whoosh bug?
